title: Ward of Draven Vision Ward is Starcall Ward
body:
I have the Ward of Draven ward skin. Placing normal generic warding trinkets and stealth wards provides the correct Draven ward.

However, placing a Vision Ward, whether via the store-bought ones or the trinket, it places a starcall ward instead. I have repeated this many times, and others have confirmed that it is indeed the Starcall Ward that I am placing, so it is not just on my end.

replies.body: This is a known issue that should be fixed soon! Thanks for the report!
